title: Handle a Roadside Inspection Report
description: A driver undergoes a DOT roadside inspection and receives a violation. The safety manager must log the report and schedule corrective action.

tasks.description: The driver uploads a photo of the inspection report, which notes a violation for a burnt-out headlight.
tasks.expected_outcome: The safety manager receives the report.

tasks.description: Log the inspection and the violation in the safety management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new compliance record is created.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority repair order for the truck to have the headlight replaced.
tasks.expected_outcome: A repair order is generated for the specific violation.

tasks.description: Once repaired, upload proof of correction to the relevant government portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The violation is formally closed out with the DOT.
